[![](https://i2.wp.com/static.flickr.com/29/67118941_42c0a3c37e.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/67118941/ "photo sharing") [The Lewisham Raindeer](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/67118941/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Now, the real strength of mobile phone cameras is this: the unexpected photo opportunity that you come across while going about your daily business. Lewisham town centre had some form of Christmas show going on today, so I grabbed a few shots with my phone while I was doing my shopping. Without the phone, Iâ€™d have missed the shot.
